abstract: Anheuser-Busch InBev, the world’s biggest brewer, sold most of its stake in Tsingtao Breweries of China to Asahi Breweries of Japan on Friday, in a $667 million deal that will help reduce its multibillion-dollar debt.
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch InBev, the world’s biggest brewer, sold most of its stake in Tsingtao Breweries of China to Asahi Breweries of Japan on Friday, in a $667 million deal that will help reduce its multibillion-dollar debt.

headline.main: InBev Sells Part of Anheuser Stake in Tsingtao
